portfolio.title: Inspirit
portfolio.description: An app that allows users to discover inspiration from a series of generated quotes, and with creating an account, save those quotes for later access. It follows the MVC format, using primarily JS and Handlebars.

portfolio.title: Paint My Mood
portfolio.description: An app that allows users to view pieces of art from several museums based on the color of your.

portfolio.title: The Third Group Project
portfolio.description: A description of our third group project will be placed here, and there will be a functional link below it.

portfolio.title: Tales of a Fledgling Society Agent
portfolio.description: A virtual novel in the works. You are a new rookie field agent to the Society, a global organization decidated to standing against outside forces that wish to manipulate and accentuate problems on Earth, primary between non-magical humans and magical or nonhumans people. With a group of new allies, you must find the surviving member of a witch's coven before a famous witch-hunting group discovers her.
